From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

After giving Gladiator access to more memory (translation: turning off 
AUTO feature for memory allocation and setting up how much memory to 
give gladiator), I got chain-lightning to do fairly decent speed 
against 60 slimes.  Now, I just go to work on upgrading it some more 
to handle 100 characters at a fairly decent speed.
